msg.msgText: A call to send() or publish() to {0} {1} from producer {2} failed because the destination is not valid.

msgExplanation.p: A valid destination must have the Name property set. If it is a queue destination, it must exist in Message Gateway. If it is a topic destination, it must not include a wild card.

msgUserResponse.p: Check that a valid name string is specified for the destination name. For a queue, ensure that the queue exists in Message Gateway. For a topic, ensure that it does not include a wild card.
